firstLoad.title: Welcome to ProofPix
firstLoad.subtitle: Professional photo documentation made easy
firstLoad.individualSubtext: Manage your own projects, with free and paid plans.
firstLoad.starterDesc: Free forever. Easily manage your first project and create stunning before/after photos ready for social sharing.
firstLoad.proDesc: For professionals. Cloud sync + bulk upload.
firstLoad.businessDesc: For small teams. Includes team management.
firstLoad.enterpriseDesc: For growing organizations. Unlimited members, multi-location support.

home.title: Home
home.selectProject: Select a project to take photos
home.deletePhotoSetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
home.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?

projects.title: Projects
projects.selectToDeleteHint: Long press on a project to select it for deletion.
projects.deleteProjectsConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} project(s)? ({{names}})
projects.userNameRequiredMessage: Please set your name in the settings before creating a new project.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.noPhotosInProject: There are no photos in this project to share.
gallery.noPhotosToUpload: There are no photos to upload.
gallery.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one photo type to share.
gallery.selectAtLeastOneUpload: Please select at least one photo type to upload.
gallery.selectProjectToView: Select a project to view photos
gallery.takePhotosToStart: Take some before/after photos to get started
gallery.whatToUpload: What would you like to upload?
gallery.mayTakeFewSeconds: This may take a few seconds
gallery.prepareShareError: Failed to prepare photos for sharing.
gallery.teamInfoMissing: Team information is missing. Please re-join the team.
gallery.signInRequiredMessage: Please sign in with Google to upload photos to your Drive.
gallery.setupNameMessage: Please configure your name in Settings before uploading.
gallery.driveFolderError: Could not create or find Google Drive folder. Please try again.
gallery.driveAccessError: Failed to access Google Drive. Please sign in again.
gallery.driveConfigMissing: Google Drive configuration is missing. Please configure your Google Drive in Settings or sign in with your Google account.
gallery.originalCombinedSearchError: Failed to find original combined images.
gallery.noPairsForCombined: No before/after pairs available to create combined photos.
gallery.noTypesWithPhotos: Please select at least one photo type with available photos.
gallery.noNewPhotosMessage: All selected photos have already been uploaded to this album. Would you like to upload them again anyway?
gallery.somePhotosUploadedMessage: {{skippedCount}} photo(s) were skipped because they were already uploaded to this album. {{newCount}} new photo(s) will be uploaded.
gallery.proxyInitError: Failed to initialize proxy session. Please try again.
gallery.uploadPartialMessage: Uploaded {{successCount}} photo(s), {{failedCount}} failed. Please try again.
gallery.deleteProjectMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this project and all its photos? This action cannot be undone.
gallery.selectAtLeastOneDestination: Please select at least one upload destination (Google Drive or Dropbox).
gallery.googleNotConnectedMessage: Please connect your Google account in Settings before uploading to Google Drive.
gallery.dropboxNotConnectedMessage: Please connect your Dropbox account in Settings before uploading to Dropbox.
gallery.dropboxUploadErrorMessage: An error occurred while uploading to Dropbox.
gallery.noUploadServiceMessage: Please connect to Google Drive or Dropbox in Settings to upload photos.
gallery.shareToSameApp: Auto-share to same app (select destination once)

settings.title: Settings
settings.labelCustomizationDescription: Customize the appearance of before/after labels on your photos.
settings.tokenWarning: Share this token with team members to let them join your team
settings.switchBackMessage: Switch back to individual mode? You can rejoin the team later.
settings.leaveTeamMessage: Are you sure you want to leave the team? You'll need a new invite to rejoin.

plans.starterDescription: Free forever. Manage your first project.

settings.signInPrompt: Sign in with Google to unlock cloud features
settings.googleAccountFeature: You need a Google account to use this feature.
settings.dropboxAccountFeature: Dropbox integration is available with Pro, Business, or Enterprise plans.
settings.dropboxNotConfigured: Dropbox app key is not configured. Please set EXPO_PUBLIC_DROPBOX_APP_KEY in your environment variables.
settings.dropboxSignInError: Failed to sign in to Dropbox. Please try again.
settings.disconnectDropboxMessage: Are you sure you want to disconnect from Dropbox?
settings.dropboxUserLimitReached: This app has reached its user limit. Please contact the app developer to increase the user limit in the Dropbox App Console, or publish the app to remove the limit.
settings.selectAtLeastOneDestination: Please select at least one upload destination (Google Drive or Dropbox).
settings.googleNotConnectedMessage: Please connect your Google account in Settings before uploading to Google Drive.
settings.dropboxNotConnectedMessage: Please connect your Dropbox account in Settings before uploading to Dropbox.
settings.dropboxUploadErrorMessage: An error occurred while uploading to Dropbox.
settings.noUploadServiceMessage: Please connect to Google Drive or Dropbox in Settings to upload photos.
settings.teamSetupFeature: Team setup requires Business or Enterprise plan
settings.contactDeveloper: Please contact {{email}} to enable multiple profiles.
settings.expoGoWarning: ⚠️ Warning: Team features don't work in Expo Go.
settings.expoGoWarningCommand: Run: npx expo run:android or npx expo run:ios
settings.watermarkHelperText: Watermark appears on combined photos only
settings.businessDescription: Watermark customization requires Business plan or higher
settings.folderCustomizationDescription: Customize the names and default status of your project sections.
settings.useFolderStructureDescription: Automatically create subfolders for different photo states.
settings.cleaningServiceDescription: Show real room names (Kitchen, Bathroom, etc.) instead of generic sections.
settings.beforeFolderDescription: Enable the folder for original photos.
settings.afterFolderDescription: Upload after photos to this folder
settings.combinedFolderDescription: Upload combined photos to this folder
settings.resetTeamMemberDescription: Reset will disconnect you from the team and clear all local data
settings.resetIndividualDescription: This will clear all projects, photos, and settings
settings.resetTeamMemberConfirm: Are you sure? This will disconnect you from the team and clear all local data.
settings.resetIndividualConfirm: Are you sure? This will clear all projects, photos, and settings.
settings.alreadyConnectedMessage: You're already connected to this team or another team
settings.setupFailedMessage: Failed to set up team connection
settings.googleSignInUnavailable: Google Sign-In is not available on this device
settings.signOutMessage: Sign out from your Google account?
settings.disconnectTeamMessage: Are you sure you want to disconnect from the team?

googleSignUp.title: Connect Your Account
googleSignUp.subtitle: Sign up with Google to enable cloud sync, bulk uploads, and team features for Pro and Business plans.

planModal.title: Choose a Plan
planModal.starterDescription: Free forever. Easily manage your first project and create stunning before/after photos ready for social sharing.
planModal.proDescription: For professionals. Cloud sync + bulk upload.
planModal.businessDescription: For small teams. Includes team management.
planModal.enterpriseDescription: For growing organizations. Unlimited members, multi-location support.

labelCustomization.title: Label Customization
labelCustomization.description: Customize the appearance of BEFORE and AFTER labels
labelCustomization.marginsDescription: Adjust the distance between labels and photo edges
labelCustomization.positionDescription: Tap a cell to select position. Left side = Before, Right side = After

folderCustomization.title: Edit Sections
folderCustomization.defaultDescription: Default sections are protected from deletion and appear in all projects
folderCustomization.protectedFolderMessage: This is a default section. Please check "Allow deletion of default sections" to delete it.
folderCustomization.mustHaveOne: You must have at least one room.
folderCustomization.deleteRoomConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this room? This action cannot be undone.
folderCustomization.resetConfirm: This will replace all your custom sections with the default sections. Continue?
folderCustomization.atLeastOneError: You must have at least one room.

roomEditor.limitReachedMessage: You can only have up to 10 sections.
roomEditor.protectedFolderMessage: This is a default section. Please check "Allow deletion of default sections" to delete it.
roomEditor.cannotDeleteMessage: You must have at least one section.
roomEditor.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this section? This action cannot be undone.
roomEditor.atLeastOneRoomError: You must have at least one section.
roomEditor.resetConfirm: This will replace all your custom folders with the default folders. Continue?
roomEditor.defaultFolderDescription: Default sections are protected from deletion and appear in all projects
